description:
Need help to get you back to feeling your best? Centrum Immune Defence & Recovery combines andrographis & vitamin C to help reduce the severity and duration of common colds symptoms, plus zinc to support immune system function. Also contains ingredients traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine: echinacea to relieve symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections & olive leaf extract to reduce body temperature.
• 50 tablets
• Key ingredients: Andrographis, Echinacea, Zinc, Vitamin C + Olive leaf extract
• No added gluten

Immunity support - Zinc to support healthy immune system function

Common cold symptoms - Andrographis + vitamin C to reduce severity & duration of common cold symptoms

Symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections - Echinacea, traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections

Body cooling - Olive leaf extract, traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to reduce body temperature
name: Centrum Benefit Blend Immune Defence With Vitamin C & Zinc 50 Pack
